title: Jacket
description: long fronted jacket of dark red treated fabric; deep side vents and blue lining; two long woven ties; self faced front and neck edges; lower edges and side vents with applied woven striped tapes interspersed with geometric patterned tapes; front edges, neck, shoulders and sleeves have heavy embroidery on blue satin--running floral and geometric patterns with white outlings; PL front has separate embroidered piece at bottom; inside PL neck has twined tie--also lower PL back
